about_the_game:
The old gods demand appeasement; honor them, and you'll rival the geniuses of your era. Each sacrifice will require an enormous amount of effort, gold, or blood, but in the end, you will become the most powerful Captain of the Caribbean. Just do it quickly before the Spanish Inquisition arrives.

  • New freeplay questline that can last until the end-game - available in both Sandbox and Story modes;
  • 5 Steam achievements;
  • 3 prized cold arms - Conquistador machete and ancient hopesh, the latter can be upgraded into a more mystical and deadly variant;
  • One powerful firearm - a hand mortar, allowing you to use grenades early in the game;
  • One very useful amulet - Taino Figurine, also known as the looter's dream, almost doubling your inventory capacity;
  • Two deadly ammo variants - bullet or grapeshot, double charged, use a gunpowder tester to make sure it's the enemy's head that explodes, not your gun;
  • Ability to respec your character's stats - the sooner you get it, the more advanced character you can build!
